summary:
- **Notification of Performance Rights Issue**:  
  - **Security Type**: Unquoted PERFORMANCE RIGHTS (BGLAB)  
  - **Total Issued**: 10,981,158  
  - **Issue Date**: 07/08/2025  
  - **Key Management Personnel (KMP) Allocation**: 729,043 to Guy Moore.  
  - **Terms**: Governed by employee incentive scheme (linked document: [ASX announcement](https://announcements.asx.com.au/asxpdf/20221018/pdf/45gdlr8mtg13cp.pdf)).  

- **Post-Issue Capital Structure**:  
  - **Ordinary Shares (BGL)**: 1,476,326,107 (quoted).  
  - **Performance Rights (BGLAB)**: 43,680,275 (unquoted, cumulative post-issue).  

- **Regulatory Context**: Issued under Listing Rule 7.2 Exception 13 (no shareholder approval required).  

**No material trading or capital markets impact identified** (routine employee incentive issuance, no dilution of quoted securities).
